title: Critical RCE in AcmeCorp HTTP Server
description: Public disclosure of RCE allowing unauthenticated remote code execution.
potential_impact_on_malware: Enables initial access via Internet-exposed servers; likely rapid exploitation within 48-72 hours

title: MOVEit Transfer zero-day leveraged by Clop
description: Exploitation of file transfer software vulnerability leading to mass data theft.
potential_impact_on_malware: Streamlines large-scale extortion without encryption (data theft-only).
notes: Supply-chain style reach via widely deployed product

title: Mirai botnet causes Dyn outage
description: Large-scale DDoS against DNS provider, impacting major internet services.
potential_impact_on_malware: Demonstrated the power of IoT botnets; spurred copycats and defensive ISP filtering.
notes: Catalyst for IoT security guidance updates

title: International operation disrupts Qakbot infrastructure
description: Coordinated action seizes C2 servers and sinkholes botnet traffic.
potential_impact_on_malware: Temporary reduction in botnet scale; adversaries shift to alternate channels.

title: Windows 10 cumulative update hardens RDP defaults
description: Changes reduce exposure to brute-force over RDP on fresh installs.
potential_impact_on_malware: Raises bar for RDP initial access; shifts attackers toward phishing and VPN exploits.
notes: Effect depends on org patch cadence and config baselines
